name: XLDragLITE
description:
Why spend $200 on a little plastic box to practice your reaction time? RaceAmerica manufacturers the entire timing system so we know what a driver needs for practice. 1 or 2 player and Full or Pro tree starts.

Upgrade to the XLDragPRO app and play against a preset RT, or against the iPad with five different skill levels. Launch with Transbrake or Gas Pedal, enter Dial-ins or make it tough and let the iPad pick Dial-ins for each run. Full statistics for each player and App Instructions included in the app.

One of the most realistic apps simulating the RT Practice boxes on the market today - now in your iPad!
